question: Please analyze this URL https://www.trikotssale.com/
thought: I need to access the URL to obtain a status code and then extract the text in the HTML to look for any characteristics of a scam website. The website is accessible, so now I need to extract the text in the HTML to look for any characteristics of a scam website. The website https://www.trikotssale.com/ has unusually low prices and claims of free products. The text also targets human psychological weaknesses by offering the biggest discounts and free shipping. The information on the website is not updated and there is no clear indication of the company behind the website. The payment methods are not common and are unusual. Based on these characteristics, it is likely that this website is a scam. {

answer.reason: The website exhibits unusually low prices claims of free products targets human psychological weaknesses has outdated information and uses unusual payment methods indicating that it is likely a scam.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
